Title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Music
Writer: Jon Vitti (screenplay), Will McRobb (screenplay), Chris Viscardi (screenplay), Jon Vitti (story), Ross Bagdasarian (characters Alvin and the Chipmunks)
Actors: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson, Jane Lynch
Plot: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.
